about_the_game:
Horror experience

V Lights was developed to offer players a 2D online horror experience. In V Lights, you can play as a cursed ghost trapped inside the house and use your abilities to hunt other players. Or you can play as one of the humans and team up to find the necessary items to escape this cursed house.

In the mood for some hunting?

When playing as the cursed ghost, you are extremely sensitive to light. However, you can phase through walls and hide inside objects in the house. Feeling hungry? Then head towards a human and lunge at them to smash them into pieces! Remember, your eyes are very sensitive to light.

Be quiet!

Remember that the flashlight in your hand is your only weapon. Your flashlight can protect you from the cursed ghost. Just point the light towards the ghost and don't look back! You need to use your flashlight conservatively, though, since the batteries can die out. Is your battery dead? Search inside the battery boxes located around the house. You can light up the environment using the light switches in the rooms when you have no batteries in your flashlight. Remember to always be quick. The ghost might be right behind you...

Game Features

•Classic Mode

Humans trying to escape the house and a ghost hunting them down!

• Flashlight

Pointing the flashlight at the ghost slows it down and limits its field of vision.

• Claws

By lunging forward, the ghost can phase through walls, hide inside objects and kill human players.

• Light Switches

The light switches inside rooms control the light inside of those rooms. Turning the switch on lights up the room. You better scram when the switch is turned off!

• Proximity Voice Chat

The voices of other players will originate from their position. More realistic communication, more exciting plans...

• Escaping From The House

Humans need to find items inside the house and bring them to the outer door in a certain order. Humans can use these items to open the door and escape the house.
